education.area: Double Majors in Computer Science and Informatics

research.name: Information and Computer Sciences Honor Program
summary: - Engaged in a pivotal project on "Risk Prediction of Cardiovascular Events using Explainable AI on Deep Learning Models" under Dr. Mohammad Moshirpour.
- Conducted comprehensive literature review and developed an optimized AI model for stress analysis during sleep, enhancing accuracy in cardiovascular risk assessment.

research.name: Research Assistant
research.institute: Ren Lab - The Chinese University of Hong Kong
summary: - Contributed to the "Surgical Foundation Model Project," focusing on data analysis and model optimization under Prof. Ren Hongliang.
- Collaborated with PhD students, refining models and advancing the project's analytical capabilities.

research.name: Research Assistant
research.institute: Shi Lab - University of California, Irvine
summary: - Developed Python algorithms for "GO3D - Spatial Organization of Single-Cell Multiomic Data," enhancing automation and imaging accuracy.
- Innovated in automated microscopy and super-resolution imaging techniques, significantly advancing the project's technological aspect.

work.name: Beluga Subtitle Group
work.summary: Founded and led a team of 130 in producing 40 videos per week, achieving over 100K fans and collaborating with top digital sector clients.

work.name: HD Education
work.summary:
Created and delivered an advanced Python course, covering libraries like Path and Tkinter, and successfully taught over 20 students.
Tailored support to diverse student groups, elevating their understanding and application of Python.
